item.title:
Consensus of Solayer Chain is achieved via beacon chain, a Solana fork with PoH etc
Solayer will have two SVM chains. One faster than rabbit, and another at light speed.

item.title:

You mining tx did not land even with high priority fee because Jito was leeching the block space.
